p: Based on the results from IHC and Western blot analyses, CK-19 and S100A13 were further analyzed by ELISA in non-depleted cyst fluid samples of the extended material of 17 cPTCs and 55 benign cystic lesions as well as reference samples ( Table 4). We also included vimentin (VIM), which was identified as a down-regulated protein in cPTC by univariate analysis and in the multivariate OPLS model ( S4 and S6 Tables).
